Posts.Content: Jan 13, 2009 07:48PM 4bethann wrote: I just love the Classique bras (style 768) and my Airway form.  The Airway has a natural looking fron, a soft microfiber back and some type of beads inside that conform the the contours of your breast area- amazingly cool and comfy.  I also like the Amonea Comfort Plus gel backed form, but for pure comfort the Airway is amazing.  www.classique1.com/bras.php  www.airwaymast.com/breastform....  www.amoena.com/us/Products/Bre...
